altTitles.ja: 傾国悪女のやり直し王女譚
傾国悪女のやり直し王女譚 騎士団長が不器用で離れません

altTitles.ja-ro: Keikoku Akujo no Yarinaoshi Oujotan: Kishi Danchou ga Bukiyou de Hanaremasen

altTitles.en: Tale of the Ravishing Villainess's Royal Second Chance at Life

description.en:
Princess Sophia, the villainess who tilted the country and staged a *coup d'état*, ended her life with a cup of poison — or so she thought. When she woke up, she was looped back to five years ago! Starting over from the age of fourteen?!

In order to avoid her execution, she decided to be a good person in her second life! Then, a serious knight protector did his best to protect her. But don't get carried away. She was the cause of his death the first time!

A love story about a former princess of a leaning kingdom and a hard-nosed knight who are trying to avert all tragedies.

---
The villainess who almost destroyed her kingdom found herself looped back to five years before her death. She is a fourteen-year old girl, loved by her father, the King, and her two brothers. Sophia remembers everything that she had done, to her maids, to her knights, to her family.

Bryath, her bodyguard, was loyal to her until he dies at war that she and her brother Riley started. She decides to save everyone including her, in this life. Everyone was aghast when Sophia told them she'll start studying for the kingdom. She is determined to be a real princess for people, not villainess, in this life.

Now she must uncover all conspiracies to avoid the tragedy. But something is off about Bryath... he is too protective in this life?!
description.ja:
処刑エンド回避のため、二度目の人生は善人キャラでまいります――！

クーデターを起こし、国を傾けた悪女・ソフィア王女は毒杯をあおり、その生涯を閉じた――はずだった。
気がついたら、五年前……十四歳に死に戻っていた!?　
これが、神がくれたチャンスならば……今度こそ間違えない。
全ての悲劇を回避してみせる――！

そうしたら、生真面目で堅物な護衛騎士が全力で守ってくれて……。
でも、ときめいてはダメ。一度目の彼の死は私が元凶なのだから！

運命に抗うべく奔走する元・傾国の王女と、堅物な騎士様のやり直しラブストーリー！
